name: security-assessment-report
description: Inspired by u/QoTSankgreall (https://www.reddit.com/r/cybersecurity/comments/1q0g8py/). Generates executive-level security assessment reports from codebase scans. Frames findings as financial risk with business-impact language, calculates 'time to low risk', and produces prioritized remediation roadmaps. Based on a 10-year IR veteran's methodology that evaluates resilience over compliance.

repo_url.description: URL of the git repository to assess (use this OR path)

path.description: Local directory path to assess (use this OR repo_url)

org_name.description: Organization name for the report header

annual_revenue_usd.description: Annual revenue in USD for financial impact calculations (optional)
